meta_description: A place to preserve the legacies I have created
status: THE WEBSITE IS CURRENTLY UNDER DEVELOPMENT
home-line-1: \ > WELCOME. YOU ARE ACCESSING THE NTDGAMES ROOT PAGE.
home-line-2: I am the creator of NTDGAMES. This is a personal project where I am starting my game development journey. I don't claim to be a professional developer, but rather an individual who is learning and passionate about creating digital experiences.
home-line-4: I am currently focused on creating simple games to master the fundamental skills. Every project you see here is an initial step, aimed at gaining experience. As my skills and expertise grow, I will move on to building larger and more complex titles.
home-line-6: The website is currently being configured. Game files and development logs are being processed and uploaded. Please stand by.
home-line-8: • Check the [Games] section to see the experimental projects I am currently working on.
home-line-9: • Follow the [News] section for learning logs and progress updates.
home-line-10: \ > THANK YOU FOR VISITING AND YOUR SUPPORT.
